mapper.sql: id, time, regOptId, observeId, value, state, observeName, icon, color, freq, position, intervalTime, deviceId, amendFlag
mapper.select:
select
from bas_monitor_display where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by observeId
select count(1) from bas_monitor_display where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by observeId
select distinct time from bas_monitor_display where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by observeId
select time from bas_monitor_display where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by time desc limit 1

select
from bas_monitor_display where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND POSITION = 0 order by time desc limit 1
SELECT * FROM bas_monitor_display WHERE regOptId = #{regOptId} AND TIME = ( SELECT TIME FROM bas_monitor_display WHERE regOptId = #{regOptId} ORDER BY TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY TIME ,observeId
mapper.insert: insert into bas_monitor_display (id, time, regOptId, observeId, value, state, observeName, icon, color, freq, position, intervalTime, deviceId, amendFlag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{observeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=REAL}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{observeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intervalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update bas_monitor_display
regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
observeId = #{observeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{value,jdbcType=REAL},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
observeName = #{observeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freq = #{freq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
intervalTime = #{intervalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amendFlag = #{amendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update bas_monitor_display set regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, observeId = #{observeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=REAL}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, observeName = #{observeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freq = #{freq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intervalTime = #{intervalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amendFlag = #{amendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
